short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and share personal wish-lists from any brand, on any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choosing and giving the perfect gifts just got easier with Wishibl.

Create your own personal online wish-list by browsing and clicking on the things you love from any website directly via the Wishibl Chrome Extension.

All your selections will be added to your personal wishibl-list in your Wishibl account, which can be shared with anyone â€“ making it super easy for your family and friends to buy the things you want with just a couple of clicks whenever the occasion arises.
